inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis on liver biopsy or transient wave elastography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Endoscopic or radiological evidence of varices in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count <150,000/mm3 and AST/ALT ratio >1 in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with frank decompensation (ascites, HE, variceal bleeding, hepato-pulmonary syndrome)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior HE controlled on standard of care therapy defined as lactulose or rifaximin for at least 2 months prior to enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitive impairment on any of the three testing strategies for HE including Psychometric hepatic encephalopathy score (PHES), Stroop test and Critical Flicker Frequency
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PHES aggregate score <-4SD based on norms published in Allampati et al located at the website www.encephalapp.com
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stroop OffTime+OnTime values greater than norms published in Allampati et al located at the website www.encephalapp.com
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis (does not meet the criteria outlined above)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: HE uncontrolled on standard of care defined as a mini-mental status exam<25
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: On regular IV albumin infusions due to scheduled paracentesis within the last 3 months
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, varices, and recent HE episode. However, unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis and recent alcohol abuse are exclusion criteria.
